name.ja: <ruby>天子の指輪<rt>エンジェリング</rt></ruby>

text.en:
Equip only to a monster you control that is equipped with an Equip Card. You can only control 1 "Angel Ring". Negate the effect of your opponent's first Spell Card or effect that resolves each turn. Once per turn, while this card is equipped to a monster: You can gain 500 LP, then destroy this card, and if you do, apply this effect.
● While the monster this card was equipped to is face-up in the Monster Zone, your opponent cannot target it with card effects.
